LanguageData.SK_WeaponMastery_LevelSectionDetail: Add or remove mastery levels up to a max of 15 levels. Each time a pawn levels up, they will get a random stat bonus. On gaining the first level, the pawn's primary weapon's name will be rerolled.
LanguageData.SK_WeaponMastery_RangedAndMeleeStatsSect: Warning: Only certain stat defs are applicable to weapons and pawns, the rest are just ignored. If you don't know what you're doing, I would highly recommend not editing anything in this section. The current menu's UI is poor and does not explain its intention decently.
Note: Percentage stats use values from 0 -> 1 which maps to 0% -> 100%
LanguageData.SK_WeaponMastery_MessageEnabledRangedSta: {0} was added to the pool of ranged weapon stats
LanguageData.SK_WeaponMastery_MessageEnabledMeleeStat: {0} was added to the pool of melee weapon stats
LanguageData.SK_WeaponMastery_MessageDisabledRangedSt: {0} was remove from the pool of ranged weapon stats
LanguageData.SK_WeaponMastery_MessageDisabledMeleeSta: {0} was remove from the pool of melee weapon stats
